verses.name: Isaiah 65:4
verses.text: Which remain among the graves, and lodge in the monuments, which eat swine’s flesh, and broth of abominable things is in their vessels;

verses.name: Isaiah 65:5
verses.text: Which say, Stand by thyself, come not near to me; for I am holier than thou. These are a smoke in my nose, a fire that burneth all the day.

verses.name: Isaiah 65:6
verses.text: Behold, it is written before me: I will not keep silence, but will recompense, even recompense into their bosom,
